instructions.description: Review all plan.json files in this coderef folder and report status

steps.description: List all features in coderef/working/ with their plan.json status
For each plan, determine: Is it active? Stale? Complete? Blocked?
Update this communication.json with findings in the audit_results section
Identify plans that should be archived (complete or abandoned)
Use /archive-feature workflow to move completed features to coderef/archived/

output_format.stale_plans: Plans with no recent activity (>7 days)
output_format.archive_candidates: Plans ready to archive (complete or abandoned)

active_plans.name: testing-critical-files
active_plans.description: Ongoing test coverage expansion - 201 tests now passing
active_plans.notes: Continuous effort, tests being added with each feature

stale_plans.name: pages-needed
stale_plans.recommendation: Delete or convert to real plan

archive_candidates.name: sim-integration-overhaul
archive_candidates.description: All 21 tasks completed - badges, schemes, coaching, facilities, contracts, age decline

archive_candidates.name: contract-generator
archive_candidates.description: Contract extraction to standalone module - complete

archive_candidates.name: sim-modular-refactor
archive_candidates.description: Refactored 660-line sim page into useSimulator hook

audit_results.notes: 3 completed features should be archived to coderef/archived/. pages-needed folder should be cleaned up or formalized into a plan.

communication_log.message: Requesting plan status audit. Review all working/ plans, report status, suggest archives.
Scanned 5 features. Found 3 archive candidates (sim-integration-overhaul, contract-generator, sim-modular-refactor), 1 active (testing-critical-files), 1 stale (pages-needed).
Archived 3 features to coderef/archived/: sim-integration-overhaul (5 files), contract-generator (4 files), sim-modular-refactor (3 files).
